itunes:title: Episode 626 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/24/20 - BREAKING: NFL Season Delayed
title: Episode 626 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/24/20 - BREAKING: NFL Season Delayed
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway hold a pop up show to announce some breaking news: The NFL season will be delayed until week 5 in October! They discuss this as well as talk about the Bubba Wallace noose embarrassment, weigh the options for the 2020 sport...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway hold a pop up show to announce some breaking news: The NFL season will be delayed until week 5 in October! They discuss this as well as talk about the Bubba Wallace noose embarrassment, weigh the options for the 2020 sports season amidst increasing player coronavirus cases, and talk about what a year with no sports will do to the economy.

Ghostbed.com/DrinkinBros
